summary: Eighteen trainers, one for each skill live and walk in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
Inside whiterun you will find all 18 trainers.
Some are located roaming the streets, others are inside, bannered mare,
drunken huntsman, jorrvaskr and dragonsreach.
They are all non essential so be careful :)

The included readme describe their specific location.
They are all masters and can train you to level 100.

None of them require any additional mods but in the screenshots I have a few mods for better females and texture replacers.

Update:
I have uploaded an alternative version that places all trainers at different towns.
Details in the included readme file.
